title: About Manas
paragraphs: I am an author and have over decade years of corporate career and a passionate trainer in providing comprehensive soft skills training for school and college students. Why students? Because I was one of them in my student life, looking for someone who can coach me on my career path, make me job-ready and help me to learn few essential softskills that would have been biggest advantage during my initial career.  If you are a school or college student, let's connect and start mentor-mentee journey today.
Self-Improvement or Personal Development, Communication, Leadership, Problem-Solving, Emotional Intelligence, Resume Writing, Mock Interviews, Group Discussion and many more...
My goal is to help students achieve their goals.
